Can I request Innervating Locket's return for no particular reason?

The only reason Atma's wasn't breaking anything anymore was because it got nerfed.

Atma's Impaler was a binary balance issue. It was an offense/defense item, with offense scaled on defense, and it worked particularly well with the class that scales best on--you guessed it--combined offense and defense. It was either just strong enough to be the best option for every bruiser as a 1st or 2nd item, or it was just weak enough that it was rarely wanted. Neither case is a good case.
